com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.lbs

Class HostScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.lbs.HostScore

  • public class HostScore
extends Object
    Helper class pairs a hostname and the normalized availabilty for that host. The availability is based on (normalized) 1 - LOAD for the host. The LOAD is computed using the IHostMetrics and an IHostScoringRule for computing the workload of a host from those metrics. The availability is then computed from the LOAD and normalized.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Field Detail

      • COMPARE_BY_SCORE

        public static final Comparator<HostScore> COMPARE_BY_SCORE
        Places elements into order by decreasing normalized load. The getHostname() is used to break any ties.

      • COMPARE_BY_HOSTNAME

        public static final Comparator<HostScore> COMPARE_BY_HOSTNAME
        Orders by hostname. This provides a stable way of viewing the data in /bigdata/status.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HostScore

        public HostScore(String hostname,
         double availability)
        Parameters:
        hostname - The hostname (required, must be non-empty).
        availability - The normalized availability score for this host.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailability

        public double getAvailability()
        Return the normalized availability for the host. Load balancing decision are based on this normalized score (work is assigned to hosts in inverse proportion to the normalized load of the host).

      • getHostname

        public String getHostname()
        Return the hostname.

      • isThisHost

        public boolean isThisHost()
        Return true iff the host is this host.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
